programme.title: Cops Who Kill
programme.desc: New. Stephanie Lazarus: Will Mellor and a team of experts uncover the case of ex-LA detective Stephanie Lazarus, who was convicted of murdering her former boyfriend's wife. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Beyond Borders
programme.desc: A convicted drug dealer on the run is apprehended by officer Ryan, while a sister waits anxiously for the release of her brother in Miami. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: In Tauranga, police dog Falcon swoops in on a fugitive who's left a trail of destruction, while drug hound Yarra discovers a less than festive find. (S11, ep 9)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Wellington Delta team Regan and Taylor chase a violent man who runs from his vehicle, while Biosecurity beagle Archie gets spicy for Dog Squad guest star Indie. (S11, ep 10)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Gold Hustle: Les goes over the edge when Ashley's bad attitude loses the shop a big customer. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Sibling War: Tensions in the store threaten to boil over as Seth and Ashley clash once again. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Les' Way: As a new customer shows up at the store with a potentially world-changing item, Les clashes with Seth over the future of the business. (S3, ep 10)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Sucker Punch: Les frantically searches for a buyer in order to win a bet with Seth. Later, a revelation sends a pair of customers on a rampage. (S3, ep 11)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: It's Always Sonny In Texas: The buyers head to Fort Worth, where a local auctioneer stirs up trouble when he joins as bidder. (S5, ep 5)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ka-Chingaladas!: Auctions in Garland bring a day of dashed hopes and sweet profits. Plus, a new buyer begins to throw some of the bidders off their game. (S5, ep 4)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Swinging With The Jenemy: The bidders return to Dallas hoping to land a locker of a lifetime. Mary flouts the law in her eagerness to score a dream unit. (S5, ep 3)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: British Invasion: The big money buyers find themselves out of their comfort zones in DeSoto. A new face from across the pond threatens to ruin Ricky and Bubba's day. (S5, ep 2)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole, Allen Millyard and Guy Willison visit top collector Stuart Imber before preparing to sell their latest finds at the Fairford Steam. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole, Allen Millyard and Guy Willison are back! This time they head to Dorset to meet Tim, the owner of a delectable collection of trinkets. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There:...
programme.desc: UFOs at Sea: Journalist Tony Harris and his team of experts will present and analyse evidence of unidentified submerged objects and render a verdict. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Seeing is Believing: For decades, governments around the world have investigated UFO sightings. How are these top-secret studies conducted? (S4, ep 6)

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Inside UFOs: Those who claim to have been abducted by extraterrestrials give their accounts of the interior of their spacecrafts. (S4, ep 7)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: A father and son see mysterious lights near their property and call the sheriff's office. A large craft covers a French town in an odd material. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: Local authorities receive over 50 UFO reports in the Chicago area on Halloween night. Multiple sightings of a large flying craft in PA are known as the Buck's County Wave. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: Weird Britain
programme.desc: Scotland: The Search for the Loch Ness Monster: Andy joins a team of Nessie experts to carry out the biggest search for the Loch Ness Monster in 50 years. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Weird Britain
programme.desc: Devon: Andy explores an ancient cavern, takes a tour of Dartmoor's prison museum and uncovers the legend behind Arthur Conan Doyle's 'The Hound of the Baskervilles'. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Weird Britain
programme.desc: Wiltshire: Andy explores Wiltshire's mysterious megaliths and barrows, visits a medieval meadery and encounters a religious pilgrimage at the site of a freshly made crop circle. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Weird Britain
programme.desc: Suffolk: Andy makes a startling discovery at the site of the Rendlesham UFO incident, before sending psychic Simi to investigate one of Britain's most haunted inns. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Weird Britain
programme.desc: Wales: Andy tracks down the site of the original Stonehenge, meets a childhood witness of Wales' most famous UFO incident and takes part in a comedic hunt for the Welsh Wildman. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Weird Britain
programme.desc: Dorset: Andy heads to the home of palaeontology on the Jurassic Coast and braves the collapsing cliffs of Lyme Regis to bring back one of its many fossils. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Beyond the Beyond: The most compelling investigations contain shocking evidence, stunning documentation and crazy experiments. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Behind the Gates - The Scientific Method: Matty Blake interviews Principal Investigator Erik Bard and astrophysicist Dr Travis Taylor about a potentially other-worldly mystery.

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Behind the Gates - Ups and Downs: While bizarre phenomena is documented in the skies, Dr Travis Taylor highlights the evidence that suggests the mysteries may lie underground.

programme.title: New: Ancient Superstructures
programme.desc: Sphinx: The most monumental ancient sculpture in the world, the half-man, half-lion Sphinx arouses the curiosity of the entire planet - but how was such a huge structure built? (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: New: Ancient Superstructures
programme.desc: Castle of Chambord: Designed on the medieval model of forts with its enclosure and large corner towers, Chambord is France's largest and most iconic castle. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: Medieval Murder Mysteries
programme.desc: Christopher Marlow: Death in Deptford: Experts investigate the strange circumstances surrounding the death of Shakespeare mentor and fellow playwright Christopher Marlow. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Mind Control: Three spine-tingling stories, including a seance that turns a housewife into a literary genius as she channels a spirit to write a series of acclaimed books. (S3, ep 10)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Falling Man, Space Rocks, Missing Feet: A high-rise window washer somehow survives a 50-storey fall and ball-sized ice chunks fall from the sky. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Falling Man, Space Rocks, Missing Feet: A high-rise window washer somehow survives a 50-storey fall and ball-sized ice chunks fall from the sky. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Real Dragons: The team travels to Australia's Blue Mountains in search of evidence that the huge megalania lizard isn't really extinct.

programme.title: UFOs Declassified
programme.desc: Red Alert: During the Cold War, strange lights and unidentified objects put governments around the world on red alert. Could extra-terrestrials have been responsible? (2 of 6)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Atlantis Apocalypse: A volcanic eruption in Santorini 3,500 years ago caused a tsunami that destroyed a Minoan civilisation and prompted the Atlantis myth. (S3, ep 10)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Toxic Cloud: A toxic chemical cloud from an industrial accident could jeopardise an entire community within minutes, putting the lives of thousands of people at risk. (S3, ep 11)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 79)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry, Allen and Guy finally get their Buick Roadmaster, cruise to a Newbury car show, and do some wheeling and dealing. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Built For Pleasure Not Speed: Bidders Lesa and Jerry play their home-field advantage at auctions in Longview, where they lock horns with Jenny and Mary. (S5, ep 7)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Once A Pawn A Time In Hollywood: When a vintage Yellow Cab hat pulls into the shop, can Rick hail a fare deal? Next, a seller pops in with a gum ball machine. Will he stick to a fair price?

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: New Hire. Now Fire!: A roid-raging meathead threatens Seth's father; Ashley surprises everyone with a brand new hire. (S4, ep 10)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Seth vs Rich: Les orders Seth and Rich to clean up the whole warehouse, in order to make room for lots of new merchandise. (S4, ep 11)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Drop the Bomb: American Jewellery is celebrating its 30th anniversary and Les wants to put on a big party to enjoy this milestone. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Pain in the Bat Mitzvah: Lydia's Bat Mitzvah is coming up, which means this is her opportunity to invite all the popular kids to her grand, out of this world party! (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: The Athenian Candidate: It's time for Mapleview to elect their school president! Dimitri wants to run and enlists the help of Julie, who loves his ideas for change within their school. (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Loud kids help Flip clean up his image in 'Flip This Flip', then in 'Haunted House Call', the Mortician's Club can't afford tickets to Casket Con, so start a business to raise money. (S6, ep 3)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Save Royal Woods!: When Royal Woods is in danger of being flooded to make room for a sixth Great Lake, the town comes together to prove that they're worth saving. (S6, ep 4)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln seeks a better seat in class in 'Musical Chairs', then in 'The Taunting Hour', Lynn gets heckled at her soccer game, and the Louds realize they all have critics. (S6, ep 5)

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: The fire department moves in with the police department in 'A House Divided', then in 'The Trojan Slooshie', The Ice Cream Truck Bandits waylay the police force with frozen drinks.(S4, ep 4)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Dreamer tries to become a knight in 'Knight Smurfalot', then in 'Forget Me What?', when Gargamel accidentally breathes in the pollen of a rare flower it instantly wipes his memory. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Lampo, the Puss in Boots: Isotta tells the Buffycats a bedtime story: Puss in Boots Lampo makes Gas a knight, but the fearsome Ogrecat is threatening the citizens of Catabas. (S2, ep 47)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The Ghost Train: There's a mysterious mystery for detective Pilou. Buddy and Derence ask for help because Meow City's cat treats have been disappearing for three nights in a row. (S2, ep 48)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Return to the Upside Down World: The Buffycats are using a robot that vacuums up dirt and transforms it into delicious smells when Strangecat invites them to play in the Upside Down World. (S2, ep 49)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: The twins split the treehouse in half in 'Fair Share', then in 'Power Plant', to win a local gardening competition, Best attempts to grow a plant, and Bester decides to be a plant. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Annoyed by SpongeBob for the last time, Squidward goes legal in 'Restraining SpongeBob', and in 'Fiasco!', Plankton steals a Krabby Patty, unaware it's really an art piece by famous artist Fiasco.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr Krabs resorts to desperate measures after Plankton drives away his customers in 'Free Samples', and then in 'Home Sweet Rubble', SpongeBob's pineapple is falling apart, and needs re-modelling.

programme.title: Zokie of Planet Ruby
programme.desc: Zokie makes Ruby more confident in 'Power Suit', then in 'What's Kraken on Pudge?', Sentinel Gorp goes on a quest to find a cute leader for the Pudgian throne to replace King Pootywinkle. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: Krabs reignites his passion for clowning in 'Krabsy the Klown', then in 'Lords of the LARP', Mo learns a new kind of fun and camaraderie. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Playing Favourites: When Alvin suspects Simon is Dave's favourite, he and Theo challenge Simon to a go-cart race to win Dave's favour.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Glory Days: Alvin worries the munks are responsible for making Dave boring when they find out he used to be a rock star.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: World Record: The Chipmunks and Chipettes compete to set a world record in hopes of winning a new virtual reality game. (S4, ep 6b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: You Troll: The Chipmunks try to keep Dave from getting on the internet after a performance he posts gets negative comments. (S4, ep 22a)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton teams up with Man Ray to take over the Krusty Krab and the world in 'Super Evil Aquatic Villain Team Up Is Go!', and in 'Chum Fricassee', Squidward quits the Krusty Krab to work for Plankton!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick go on an advertising blitz in 'The Good Krabby Name', and in 'Move It or Lose It', Mr. Krabs and Plankton issue petitions to get their rival's restaurant bulldozed.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: The Yoke's on You: Before the Prism Battle, Shadow and Sonic go head-to-head in an epic fight. In New Yoke City, the Chaos Council discover Sonic's connection to their power source. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Escape from New Yoke: The rebels battle the Chaos Council to secure the "Crystal" that gives supreme power. Sonic assumes this crystal is the Paradox Prism, but he's stunned by the truth. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Not So Fast and Furious: A new super-fast villain is wreaking havoc in Secret Shores, but after Billy's speed accidentally triggers an avalanche, he decides to hang up his cape and retire. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: For Your Spies Only: Max and Phoebe attend Parent-Teacher Night, leaving Chloe and friends home without supervision. When Jinx finds the Lair, he believes spies are targeting the school. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry's Jelly: After Jasper is lauded for being a local hero, Henry becomes jealous that Kid Danger is the one getting thanks while Henry himself gets nothing. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Text, Lies, & Video: When a video of Henry and Ray transforming into Kid Danger and Captain Man gets out, Henry must get it back so that his secret identity isn't revealed. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing in 'Appointment TV', and then in 'Karen's Virus', Karen gets a computer virus, and it's up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick have their peaceful day disturbed by Sandy in 'Squirrel Jelly', then in 'The String', SpongeBob pulls from Squidward's shirt a loose string that never seems to end.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Parent Trap: When Bocarter's father helps him with his class project, Alvin enlists Dave's help, locking the families in a heated competition.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Lucky Day: Alvin's luck goes from bad to worse after Theodore finds a four-leaf clover and everything starts going his way.

programme.title: Sigldigwt

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Help Llaw

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae Wini'n cyfarfod ag ystlumod mae hi eisiau chwarae â nhw, ond mae'r ystlumod yn hedfan i ffwrdd. O na! Wynona encounters some bats she wants to play with, but the bats fly away. Oh-no!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Huw a'r criw sy'n caslgu sbwriel ar un o draethau Ynys Môn, bydd Meia ac Elsa yn wyna ar eu fferm ger Aberystwyth, a Meleri sy'n ymweld â gardd go arbennig yng Nhydweli. Outdoorsy fun.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Siôn a'i ffrindiau'n ceisio eu gorau glas i guddio buwch rhag Magi. Siôn and his friends try their best to hide a surprise cow for Maggie.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Guto eisiau gwybod o ble mae cocos yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd ag ef i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio iddo. Guto wants to know where cockles come from.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae heddiw'n ddiwrnod Cystadleuaeth Sglefrio yng Nghwmtwrch a mae pawb yn ymuno yn yr hwyl hyd yn oed Twm Twrch! Today there is a Skating Competition in Cwmtwrch.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Joni a Jini yn mynd ar nerfau ei gilydd. Ond wedi noson yng nghwmni eu cefnder annifyr, buan mae pethau'n newid. Joni and Jini get on each other's nerves but soon enough things change.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon, creaduriaid yr ardd fydd yn cael y sylw: y Mwydyn a'r Pry cop. In this programme we look at animals that live in our garden: the Worm and the Spider.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'r breichledi 'Gwna di, gwna fi' yn gadael i chwaraewyr gopio symudiadau Bow Wow Bwgi ei gilydd. The 'You Do, I Do' bracelets let players copy each other's Bow Wow Boogie moves.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Cynwyd Sant sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chware llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Cynwyd Sant join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Cyfle i edych 'nôl dros rai o gyfarchion pen-blwydd yr wythnos. A look back at some of this week's birthday greetings from Cyw.

programme.title: Y Cosmos
programme.desc: Mae'r rhaglen hon yn dilyn y gyfres o ddigwyddiadau rhyfeddol ddigwyddodd yn yr eiliad gyntaf mewn hanes. The remarkable events that took place in the first ever second in history.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Sioned yn dangos sut i luosogi planhigion efo torriadau gwaelodol, ac Adam yn trwsblannu yn yr ardd lysiau. In Pant y Wennol, Meinir creates a large planter out of an old filing cabinet.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Tro hwn, cawn drefnu priodas Jennifer ac Iolo o Dal-y-sarn, sy'n awyddus i briodi ar ben Yr Wyddfa. This time - the wedding of Jennifer and Iolo, who want to get hitched on Yr Wyddfa.

programme.title: Bwrdd i Dri
programme.desc: Yn y gyfres yma mae 3 seleb yn paratoi pryd o fwyd 3 chwrs i'w fwynhau gyda'i gilydd. Mae'r 3 chogydd heddiw yn gerddorion adnabyddus yng Nghymru. The 3 cooks today are famous musicians.

programme.title: Iolo: Natur Bregus Cymru
programme.desc: Yn ystod oes pan mae bywyd gwyllt o dan fygythiad difrifol, edrycha Iolo ar gyflwr natur Cymru. During an age in which wildlife is under threat, Iolo looks at the state of Wales' nature.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Y tro yma, mae Alwenna y nyrs yn ceisio dod o hyd i gartref i'w ffrind newydd - Frankie'r ffured, a ras i achub dafad yn geni a chi bach. The vets care for a ferret, a sheep and a puppy!

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri
programme.desc: Crwydr gyda Harri Parri i ddarganfod hanes diwylliant Pen Llyn heddiw. Harri Parri asks whether the culture of Pen Llyn is still flourishing in a changing world.

programme.title: Ralio: Ynysoedd Canarias
programme.desc: Rhaglen uchafbwyntiau yn dilyn digwyddiad rasio modur Rali Islas Canarias 2025, a gynhaliwyd dros 4 diwrnod o (24-27 Ebrill). Highlights programme following the 2025 Rally Islas Canarias.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrdd ag Arwel Williams o Borthmadog, sy'n mwynhau llnau simneiau a sgwrsio da'r cwsmeriaid ac sy'n feiciwr brwd ar benwythnosau. We meet a chimney-sweeping character from Porthmadog.

programme.title: Y Seintiau Newydd v Cei Connah
programme.desc: Rownd Derfynol byw Cwpan Cymru JD '24/25: Y Seintiau Newydd v Cei Connah. Rodney Parade. C/G 16.00. Live '24/25 JD Welsh Cup final: The New Saints v Connah's Quay. Rodney Parade. K/O 16.00.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nôl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: New: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Bydd Nia yn Aberhonddu i ddysgu mwy am etifeddiaeth grefyddol y fro - Cadeirlan Anglicanaidd y dref, hen gapel Cymraeg y Plough a mwy. We learn more about Brecon's rich religious heritage.

programme.title: New: Prosiect Pum Mil
programme.desc: Gyda mond £5K ma Trystan ac Emma yn derbyn her i drawsnewid iard chwarae Canolfan Deulu y Bala efo help y cynllunydd Gwyn Eiddior. This time, we transform Canolfan Deulu y Bala playground.

programme.title: New: Bariau
programme.desc: Mae Barry mewn twll sy'n amhosib dianc ohono, mae iechyd meddwl Peter yn gwaethygu, a Simon am waredu ar Barry. Barry is in an inescapable hole and Peter's mental health is deteriorating.

programme.title: Troseddau Cymru Gyda Sian Lloyd
programme.desc: Stori Leanne Lewis a ddioddefodd trais yn y cartref cyn gwneud y penderfyniad i ddatgelu beth oedd yn digwydd. Devastating first hand account of domestic violence survivor, Leanne Lewis.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru

programme.desc: Yn y bennod olaf awn i Drefach Felindre, byd y melinau gwlan. Cawn flas o fywyd y pentre gan John Crossley sydd wedi byw a gweithio yno ers tro. Last in series and we're in Drefach Felindre.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Coch a Glas yn cystadlu i baentio castell ac yn cwrdd â Phorffor. Red and Blue compete to colour a castle, and meet new arrival Purple.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Anifeiliaid anwes yw'r thema y tro hwn a down i nabod y gath, y mochyn cwta a'r bochdew. The theme this time is pets and we get to know about cats, guinea pigs and hamsters.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Er nad oedd o am i Fflopsi a Mopsi fynd efo fo ar un o'i anturiaethau, mae Guto'n darganfod bod yr efeilliaid yn gallu bod yn gwmni difyr iawn. Guto finds out his twin sisters can be fun!

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y môr-ladron sy'n ymuno â Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo'n gweld nad yw ei wy wedi ffrio yn hoff o gael ei chyffwrdd gan ei sbageti! Pablo goes to a café with his Mum and gets an egg and spaghetti hoops, but his food is upset - oh no!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Tro hwn, teithiwn yn ôl mewn hanes i ddysgu am gychod campus a sut wnaethon nhw lwyddo hwylio moroedd y byd. We travel back in time to learn about boats and how they sail the oceans.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'n ddiwrnod rasio yn Pentre Papur Pop ac mae Pip wedi dewis y cwrs! On today's poptastic adventure, it's the annual Pop Paper City go-kart race.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Ar y Newffion heddiw, mae cennin yn bwysig iawn i Gymru, ond beth mae'r statws PGI newydd yn ei olygu? Today: what does the new PGI status mean for leeks, about what about light pollution?

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae Seren yn creu darlun, mae'r Capten yn sylwi ar ddiferion paent ac mae Fflwff yn dysgu sut i stampio siapiau. Seren paints a picture and Fflwff learns to stamp shapes on canvas.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Stiw'n difaru rhoi ei deganau ar werth yn y sêl garej mae'r teulu'n ei chynnal. Stiw decides to sell some of his old toys at the family's garage sale, but regrets doing so afterwards.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae defaid du a gwyn Fflur ar goll! Wedi tipyn o ymdrech gan Jen, Jim, Bolgi a Cyw, mae'r gorlan yn llawn anifeiliaid du a gwyn. Fflur's black and white sheep are missing. Can anyone help?

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae masg hynafol yn gwneud i Maer Campus ymddwyn fel mwnci. All y Pawenlu ei achub o'r jyngl? An ancient mask makes Mayor Campus act monkeyish! Can the Paw Patrol save him from the jungle?

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymuno a chriw o syrffwyr ifanc yn Ninas Dinlle, garddio ar y rhandir yng Nghaerdydd, a mynd ar helfa synhwyrau gyda Leisa, Cadi, Erin a Beca. More adventures in the open air.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cân fywiog a doniol am anifeiliaid a'u synau. A lively and entertaining song about animals and the sounds they make.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae'r Garddwr yn cael syniad da i greu cynllun i adael Medwyn y Mwydyn ar y stryd, er mwyn i Twm Twrch a Dorti ofalu amdano. The Gardener has a good idea involving poor Medwyn the worm.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan na fydd baneri newydd ar gyfer y rheilffordd yn cyrraedd, a all y dreigiau achub y dydd? When new flags for the railway don't arrive, can the dragons to save the day?

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan mae Pwti yn gweld Gwich yn ei offer snorclan newydd mae'n meddwl taw bwystfil dwr yw e. Gwich is trying out his new snorkelling equipment but Pwti mistakes him for a River Monster.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus yn llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc!

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Oren egnïol yn cyrraedd Gwlad y Lliwiau. Energetic Orange arrives in Colourland.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Y tro hwn yr Eliffant Asiaidd a'r Macac sy'n cael y sylw. This time we get to know the Asian Elephant and the Macaque.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Nel Gynffon-wen wedi mynd i chwilio am ei ffrind newydd, y Llyg. When Nel Gynffon-wen leaves the burrow in search of her new friend, Guto must find his sister before Hen Ben does.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y môr-ladron sy'n ymuno â Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Pan mae ei grys-T newydd yn cosi mae'n gwrthod gwisgo unrhyw ddillad! Pablo finds an itchy label in his T-shirt and decides not to get dressed!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Awn yn ol i'r flwyddyn 1804 i ddysgu am y trên stem cyntaf a gafodd ei ddefnyddio yng Nghymru, yn Merthyr Tudful. We return to 1804 to learn about the first ever steam train.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Mai-Mai yn colli llyfr lluniau arbennig Mabli ond all hi ddefnyddio camera Pip i ailosod y lluniau coll? On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are spring cleaning!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Heddiw byddwn yn clywed hanes ci ar goll yn Nhreorci. Cawn hefyd ddatgelu enillydd cystadleuaeth creu poster hawliau plant. We ask the public in Wales about children using mobile phones.

programme.title: Sgwrs dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen yma fe fydd Elin Fflur yn cael cwmni yr arweinydd, Trystan Lewis. In this programme Elin Fflur will be joined by conductor, Trystan Lewis. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Ry' ni'n fyw o Wyl Gomedi Machynlleth, ac awn hefyd i noson dathlu lleisiau Y Llais yn Rhydaman. We're live from the Machynlleth Comedy Festival and a night celebrating singers from Y Llais.

programme.title: Ty Am Ddim
programme.desc: Tro ma, bwthyn bach Cymraeg traddodiadol ym Mhennant sy'n cael ei adnewyddu gan ddau hogyn lleol. This time, an electrician and a carpenter renovate a traditional Welsh cottage in Pennant.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Iaith ar Daith
programme.desc: Ian 'H' Watkins o Steps sydd yn mynd â'r Iaith Ar Daith y tro ma efo help y gantores Bronwen Lewis. Steps superstar Ian 'H' Watkins learns Welsh with the help of singer Bronwen Lewis.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Gwyrdd yn cyrraedd, gan ddod â'i lliw naturiol i Wlad y Lliwiau. Green arrives, bringing her natural colour to Colourland.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n cael cystadleuaeth cerdded mynydd. On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are having a mountain hiking competition!

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan fydd mellt yn taro, mae'r dreigiau angen cario negeseuon yn ôl a 'mlaen ar y rheilffordd. When lightning strikes, it's up to the dragons to carry coded messages on the railway.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twrchelo yn beirniadu cystadleuaeth arlunio ac mae Dorti wedi penderfynu cystadlu gan ei bod yn hoff o beintio. Twrchelo judges an art competition and Dorti has decided to compete.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Ar y Newffion heddiw byddwn ni'n clywed mwy am drychfilod ymhob rhan o Gymru. A beast has been seen roaming around Bala - this, and some more Welsh children's news in Newffion Ni.

programme.title: Larfa
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Larfa heddiw? What's happening in the Larfa world today?

programme.title: Bwystfil
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, byddwn yn darganfod deg bwystfil sy'n gaeafgysgu. When Winter takes hold, it can be hard for some animals to survive, but hibernation is one solution. We discover more!

programme.title: Li Ban
programme.desc: Mae gweledigaeth derwydd, siwrne hir, ceffyl enfawr, a llifogydd ysgytwol, yn arwain at antur danfor. A druid's vision, a world-shattering flood and more lead to an underwater adventure.

programme.title: LEGO® DREAMZzz
programme.desc: Wedi syfrdanu o golli eu hatgofion, mae'r Cwsgarwyr yn chwilio am rhywun i feio. Reeling from the loss of their memories, the dream chasers go in search of someone to blame.

programme.title: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Mae Lloyd, PB ac Abacus yn ffeindio pryfyn wedi rhewi mewn ciwb iâ. Diferyn o gownter y gegin wedyn, ac maen nhw'n cwrdd â Marvin! Lloyd, PB and Abacus discover a fly frozen in an ice cube.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Cyfres gyda Aled Samuel a'r hanesydd adeiladau, Bethan Scorey, yn edrych ar gartrefi yng Nghymru. Y tro hwn, byddwn yn edrych ar dai gweithwyr. This time, we focus on worker's houses.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Gyda Dani yn bwriadu gwirio stoc Copa - mae gan Britney broblem. Amidst their worries about her health, Philip and Lowri are determined to keep things as normal as possible for Mia's sake.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd
programme.desc: Tro hwn, cawn weld ddylanwad yr Eidal ar ryseitiau Colleen, ac mae'r teulu oll yn dod draw am bitsa mae hi wedi creu. This time, we learn about recipes influenced by Colleen's time in Italy.

programme.title: New: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Adam yn llawn clod i deulu'r cor-bwmpen, ac yn 'Wythnos Ymwybyddiaeth Compostio', mae Meinir yn compostio yn null 'bokashi' o Japan. Sioned's busy curating the wild garden in Pont y Twr.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad: Brian Castell Howell
programme.desc: Cwrdd â Brian Jones, y gwr diymhongar tu ôl i fusnes bwyd & arlwyo llwyddiannus Castell Howell. We meet Brian Jones, the modest man behind successful Welsh business, Castell Howell.

programme.title: Gwesty Aduniad
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Aduniad ar agor eto ac yn dod a Peter Jones a'i dad at ei gilydd am y tro cynta erioed. Political activist Meinir Ffransis reunites with a cell-mate and a gang of carers reunite.

programme.title: Y Sîn
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, cawn gyfarfod yr actor a chyfarwyddwr Rebecca Wilson, a gweld gwaith y gof Annie Higgins. Today, we juggle with circus performer Ciaran Innes and meet budding costume designers.

programme.title: LIV Golf Live
programme.desc: Korea - Round Three: Coverage of action from the final round of the LIV Golf tour's debut in Korea as some of the sport's biggest names compete at the Jack Nicklaus Golf Club.

programme.title: Made in Britain
programme.desc: Bombay Sapphire and Ghillie Kettle: Go behind the scenes at the Bombay Sapphire gin distillery, then discover how the ingenious design of the Ghillie Kettle works while outdoors. [SL] S1 Ep8

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Royal Kitchen Gardens
programme.desc: Dumfries House: A trip to Ayrshire sees Raymond visit the splendid Dumfries House and hear how King Charles III's passion for sustainability is being passed on. S1 Ep3

programme.title: James Martin's Saturday Morning
programme.desc: James is back in the kitchen and is this time joined by singer Matt Goss, chefs Jose Pizarro and Levi Roots, and gardener David Domoney. S8 Ep18

programme.title: New: Katie Piper's Weekend Escape
programme.desc: Join Katie in her self-built space for resetting and relaxing in - as she and Toby Tarrant try some belly dancing, hairdresser Michael Douglas transforms another charity founder. S1 Ep3

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

programme.title: Cause Célèbre
programme.desc: 1987. Drama. Directed by John Gorrie. Stars Helen Mirren, Harry Andrews & David Suchet. The story of Alma Rattenbury and her young lover, who were jointly accused of murdering her elderly husband. [S]

programme.title: The Velvet Touch
programme.desc: 1948. Thriller. A police captain (Sydney Greenstreet) must solve the murder of a producer. Was it his ex or his ex ex? Stars Rosalind Russell, Leo Genn & Claire Trevor.

programme.title: Captain Scarlett
programme.desc: 1953. Adventure. Director: Thomas Carr. Stars Richard Greene, Leonora Amar & Manolo Fabregas. Scarlett returns to France to find the Duke of Corlaine seizing property and terrorising resistors. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Pigeon Decoy/Fishing with a Dog Nobbler. 1980. Jack Hargreaves demonstrates the use of a mechanical pigeon decoy before going trout fishing with an artificial minnow called a 'dog nobbler'. [S]

programme.title: Dick Tracy Vs Crime Inc.
programme.desc: 1941. Action. Directors: John English & William Witney. Stars Ralph Byrd, Michael Owen & Jan Wiley. Dick Tracy goes up against a villain known as The Ghost, who can turn himself invisible.

programme.title: Look At Life The Other Film World
programme.desc: 1965. A marvellous look at how the film camera is used in science and industry to increase an individual's knowledge.

programme.title: Star Performance: The Deceiving Eye
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director: Alvin Ganzer. Stars Frank Lovejoy & Ann Robinson. A professor works with the police to prove that eyewitnesses can't be trusted, but things take an unexpected turn. [S]

programme.title: Beachhead
programme.desc: 1954. War. Directed by Stuart Heisler. Stars Tony Curtis, Frank Lovejoy & Mary Murphy. The story of four marines as they embark on a hazardous mission to find the location of Japanese minefields. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Great Feud. 1962. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Donna Douglas & Raymond Bailey. The Clampett clan takes great offense when Sonny jilts Elly, and they start a feud with the Drysdales. [S]

programme.title: The Naked Hills
programme.desc: 1956. Western. Directed by Josef Shaftel. Stars David Wayne, Keenan Wynn & James Barton. An Indiana farmer develops an insatiable thirst for gold and sets off to find fortune in California. [S]

programme.title: Larry Adler
programme.desc: 1959. In this rare reel, American harmonica player Larry Adler performs with pianist Ellis Larkins. He plays an original composition as well as Bach, Mozart, Gershwin and W.C. Handy.

programme.title: Look At Life Watch on the Coast
programme.desc: 1968. A short film following the work of the Coastguards who secure Britain's coasts.

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Devil's Fingers. 1966. Stars Adam West, Liberace & Marilyn Hanold. Batman and Robin must stop a nefarious concert pianist who's plotting to kill Bruce and marry Aunt Harriet. [S]

programme.title: The Hasty Heart
programme.desc: 1949. Richard Todd, Ronald Reagan & Patricia Neal star in this sensitive adaptation of John Patrick's play focusing on a soldier with little time left, & the friendships he makes with those around him

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Charm Pedlar. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Victor Maddern, John Arnatt. Robin goes undercover as a conman in an attempt to expose a crooked charm pedlar but ends up in trouble with the Sheriff. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Big Skate/Pannage. 1986. Jack Hargreaves recounts a trip to Shetland in search of large fish. In his second film, he witnesses pigs dealing with a bumper crop of acorns. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: Mike and Noel watch behind the scenes Worzel, Gilbert Harding's home lighting lessons from the 50s, unseen footage of James Bond on location and a driving lesson from British Railways in the 50s. [S]

programme.title: Last Holiday
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. Directed by Henry Cass. Stars Alec Guinness, Beatrice Campbell & Kay Walsh. A salesman who learns he has months to live cashes in his savings to live in a fancy hotel. [S]

programme.title: Nine, Dalmuir West
programme.desc: Kevin Brownlow's atmospheric homage to Glasgow's tram system follows the last tram to run in September 1962.

programme.title: Gideon's Way
programme.desc: The Prowler. Stars John Gregson, Alexander Davion and Daphne Anderson. A young man with a domineering mother snaps after his fiancée took her own life. [S]

programme.title: The Wheeltappers and Shunters Social Club
programme.desc: Episode 23. 1975. Tony Christie sings 'Amarillo' and 'Old Man River'. Francis Yip sings 'Make My Life a Bit Brighter'. Terri Rogers, Alan Randall and Eddie Flanagan also star. [S]

programme.title: Accident
programme.desc: 1967. Drama. Directed by Joseph Losey. Stars Dirk Bogarde, Stanley Baker & Jacqueline Sassard. An Oxford University professor yearns for an affair with his beautiful and enigmatic student Anna. [S]

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: Sunset mansions. Stars: Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Budgie joins the world of show business after meeting Janey and Denzil. [S]

programme.title: The Story of Shirley Yorke

programme.title: The Ice House
programme.desc: 1978. Horror. Directed by Derek Lister. Stars John Stride & Elizabeth Romilly. A recently divorced man seeks solace in a countryside retreat but does not find the comfort he was looking for. [S]

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Private Account. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Jesse White & Karen Sharpe. Bill Longley is trapped by a landslide but is rescued by Johhny Hinshaw who, he soon discovers, is on the run from the law. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Beatle Drive. 1963. Stars Barbara Mitchell, Hugh Walters & Annette Robertson. Georgie's inventive genius is put to a halt. Meanwhile, Lofty's sister pulls four boffins away from their studies. [S]

programme.title: Flight From Vienna
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Director: Denis Kavanagh. Stars John Bentley, Theodore Bikel & Donald Gray. When a Hungarian official asks for asylum in the west, he is forced to go back home to prove his sincerity. [S]

programme.title: Dead Man's Evidence
programme.desc: 1963. Crime drama directed by Francis Searle and starring Conrad Phillips and Jane Griffiths. Phillips stars as a British secret agent investigating the discovery of a dead, washed up frogman. [S]

programme.title: The Hangman Waits
programme.desc: 1947. Thriller. Director: A. Barr-Smith. Stars John Turnbull & Hylton Allen. This 1947 semi-documentary style featurette is a story of grisly murders by a cinema organist. [S]

programme.title: Third Party Risk
programme.desc: 1955. Crime. Directed by Daniel Birt. Stars Lloyd Bridges, Finlay Currie & Maureen Swanson. A man holidaying in Spain becomes inadvertently mixed up in a case of murder and microfilm smuggling. [S]

programme.title: The Tall Men
programme.desc: 1955. Western. Directed by Raoul Walsh. Stars Clark Gable, Jane Russell & Robert Ryan. Two brothers and their pompous employer make an arduous journey across the frontier driving a herd of cattle. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock: The Secret Weapon

programme.title: Out of the Fog

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies

programme.desc: Cory and the Tuba: Cory gets a tuba and his family suffers the consequences. (S1 Ep60)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: The Return of Teeny Weeny: Feeling bad about his sneaky ninja past, Teeny Weeny tries to help defeat the ninjas using his monster powers. (S4 Ep35)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Robo-Wolf: The Wolfies want their own Robo-servant... but get more than they wish for! (S4 Ep36)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: The Labours of Armadylan: Armadylan tries to fix a museum artefact without telling the PJ Masks. (S4 Ep37)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Lost in Space: Romeo wants to create the ultimate trap for the PJMasks - but accidentally turns the Flying Factory computer system hyper-intelligent - and hostile. (S4 Ep38)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Clover Takes Over: When Clover's overconfidence jeopardises a medical air mission, the bronto learns to ask for help. (S2 Ep47)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: You're More Than Your Roar: When Biscuit gets a case of roaringitis and some egg-stealing Raptors invade the Ranch, Biscuit goes to ridiculous lengths to restore his roar. (S2 Ep48)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Dino Patient Pileup: When a large amount of dinos with boo-boos need help at the Hatchery, Min neglects to take the time to show Jon, Miguel, Blitz, and Tango how to help her. (S2 Ep49)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Sonny Wings It: Min needs to find a cactus to make a soothing ointment for some wild stegos but finds herself competing for it with Sonny the Kid... and Stormwing! (S2 Ep50)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Twister with a Chance of Thundertot: When Thundertot gets into Stormwing's territory, Twister must conquer his preconceptions of Spinosaurs to rescue the baby dino. (S2 Ep51)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Ten Gallon Trophy: When Bopper runs off with Bo's prized Ten Gallon Trophy Hat, Tango believes that she has to be like Blitz and Clover in order to help the gang. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Plane Crazy: When Miguel underestimates his dino pals and gets carried away by his dream of flying, he learns that he needs to believe in his dino-friends as much as he believes in an idea. (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Mighty Dino Mites: When Blitz's favorite stuffy goes missing, the dino mites team up to track down the culprit and save the day. (S2 Ep17)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Home Sweet Home: When Clover tries to help a wild Rhinorex by bringing her home with him, the lovably messy dinosaur soon causes problems for her new Dino Ranch friends. (S2 Ep18)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: The Mystery Guest: Somebody terribly scary has climbed into the house of Penguin and made a terrible mess there! Bear rushes down to Antarctica to help, and Masha tags along with him. (S5 Ep22)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Troubadours: After Molang and Piu Piu saved the king, he offers them a special gift... armour, a shield and a sword to go and chase off the dragon! (S5 Ep17)
